questions.question_text: Bhagwanne bhajavā ethī bījī vāt moţī ______.
questions.explanation: According to Vach.Je.5, 'Bhagwanne bhajavā ethī bījī vāt moţī nathī.'

questions.question_text: je brahmarūp thayo tene ja ______ bhaktino adhikār chhe.
questions.explanation: According to Vach.Lo.7, 'je brahmarūp thayo tene ja Purushottamnī bhaktino adhikār chhe.'

questions.question_text: je Bhagwānnā pratāpne vichārīne ______ kare chhe, te to potānā swarūpne atishay ujjval prakāshmān jue chhe ane te prakāshne madhye pratyaksh evā je Purushottam Bhagwān tenī mūrtine jue chhe
questions.explanation: According to Vach.Ga.Pa.20, 'je Bhagwānnā pratāpne vichārīne antardrashți kare chhe, te to potānā swarūpne atishay ujjval prakāshmān jue chhe ane te prakāshne madhye pratyaksh evā je Purushottam Bhagwān tenī mūrtine jue chhe'

questions.question_text: potānā jīvātmāne e brahma sangathe ekatā karīne ______ Swāmī-sevakbhāve upāsanā karavī.
questions.explanation: According to Vach.Ga.Ma.3, 'potānā jīvātmāne e brahma sangathe ekatā karīne Parabrahmanī Swāmī-sevakbhāve upāsanā karavī.'

questions.question_text: Jem Bhagwānnī mānasī pūjā kare tem ja je uttam haribhakta hoy tenī pan Bhagwānnī prasādīe karīne Bhagwan bheļī mānasī pūjā kare...to te kanishth bhakta hoy ne te be janme tathā chār janme tathā das janme ke so janme karīne uttam bhakta jevo thanāro hoy, te āne janme karīne ______ thây chhe.
questions.explanation: According to Vach.Va.5, 'Jem Bhagwānnī mānasī pūjā kare tem ja je uttam haribhakta hoy tenī pan Bhagwānnī prasādīe karīne Bhagwan bheļī mānasī pūjā kare...to te kanishth bhakta hoy ne te be janme tathā chār janme tathā das janme ke so janme karīne uttam bhakta jevo thanāro hoy, te āne janme karīne uttam bhakta thây chhe.'

questions.question_text: Mārī asht prakārnī je pratimā tathā je sant tene vishe hu ______ nivās karīne rahu chhu.
questions.explanation: According to Vach.Ga.Pa.68, 'Mārī asht prakārnī je pratimā tathā je sant tene vishe hu akhand nivās karīne rahu chhu.'

questions.question_text: Bhagwān ne Bhagwānnā sant e ja ______ chhe... Bhagwān ke Bhagwānnā santnī jyāre prāpti thaï tyāre e jīvne ethī uparānt bīju koī kalyāņ nathī, e ja param kalyān chhe.
questions.explanation: According to Vach.Ga.Ma.59, 'Bhagwān ne Bhagwānnā sant e ja kalyāņkārī chhe... Bhagwān ke Bhagwānnā santnī jyāre prāpti thaï tyāre e jīvne ethī uparānt bīju koī kalyāņ nathī, e ja param kalyān chhe.'

questions.question_text: jene potānu kalyāņ ichchhavu tene to Bhagwān ne Bhagwānnā sādhu ethī uparānt bīju kāī ______ sukhdāyī nathī.
questions.explanation: According to Vach.Ga.An.7, 'jene potānu kalyāņ ichchhavu tene to Bhagwān ne Bhagwānnā sādhu ethī uparānt bīju kāī jagatmā sukhdāyī nathī.'

questions.question_text: Sant hu ne hu te vaļi sant re, Em Shrimukhe kahe ______ re; Sant mānajo māri murati re, Emā fer nathi ek rati re...
questions.explanation: According to PURUSHOTTAM PRAKASH 41/9, 'Sant hu ne hu te vaļi sant re, Em Shrimukhe kahe Bhagwant re; Sant mānajo māri murati re, Emā fer nathi ek rati re...'

questions.question_text: jevu paroksh Bhagwānnā ______ avatārnu māhātmya jāņe chhe tathā Nārad, Sanakādik, Shukjī, Jad-Bharat, Hanuman, Uddhav ityādik je parokșh sādhu tenu jevu māhātmya jāņe chhe tevu ja pratyaksh evā je Bhagwān tathā te Bhagwānnā bhakta sādhu tenu māhātmya samaje tene kalyānnā mārgmā kāīye samajavu bākī rahyu nahī.
questions.explanation: According to Vach.Ga.Ma.21, 'jevu paroksh Bhagwānnā Rām-Krushņādik avatārnu māhātmya jāņe chhe tathā Nārad, Sanakādik, Shukjī, Jad-Bharat, Hanuman, Uddhav ityādik je parokșh sādhu tenu jevu māhātmya jāņe chhe tevu ja pratyaksh evā je Bhagwān tathā te Bhagwānnā bhakta sādhu tenu māhātmya samaje tene kalyānnā mārgmā kāīye samajavu bākī rahyu nahī.'

questions.question_text: Game tevo pāpī hoy ne ant same jo tene 'Swāminārāyan evā ______ uchchāran thây to te sarva pāp thakī chhūtīne Brahmamoholne vishe nivās kare
questions.explanation: According to Vach.Ga.Pa.56, 'Game tevo pāpī hoy ne ant same jo tene 'Swāminārāyan evā nāmnu uchchāran thây to te sarva pāp thakī chhūtīne Brahmamoholne vishe nivās kare'

questions.question_text: Swāminārāyan nāmnā mantra jevo bījo koī mantra āj ______ nathī ne e mantre kāļā nāgnu pan zer na chade ne e mantre vishay ūdī jāy chhe, brahmarūp thây chhe ne kāļ, karma, māyānu bandhan chhūtī jāy chhe, evo bahu baliyo e mantra chhe. Māțe nirantar bhajan karavu.
questions.explanation: According to Swa.Vato.1/153, 'Swāminārāyan nāmnā mantra jevo bījo koī mantra āj baļiyo nathī ne e mantre kāļā nāgnu pan zer na chade ne e mantre vishay ūdī jāy chhe, brahmarūp thây chhe ne kāļ, karma, māyānu bandhan chhūtī jāy chhe, evo bahu baliyo e mantra chhe. Māțe nirantar bhajan karavu.'

questions.question_text: Bhagwānnā bhaktanā drohe karīne jevu ā jīvnu bhūndu thây chhe ne e jīvne kașht thāy chhe tevu koī ______ karīne nathī thatu; ane Bhagwānnā bhaktanī mane, vachane, dehe karīne je sevā banī āve ne tene karīne jevu ā jīvnu rūdu thây chhe ne e jīvne sukh thây chhe tevu bīje koī sādhane karīne nathī thatu... Māte jene dehe karīne param sukhiyā thavu hoy ne deh mūkyā kede pan param sukhiya thavu hoy, tene Bhagwānnā bhaktano mane, vachane, dehe karīne droh na karavo.
questions.explanation: According to Vach.Ga.Ma.40, 'Bhagwānnā bhaktanā drohe karīne jevu ā jīvnu bhūndu thây chhe ne e jīvne kașht thāy chhe tevu koī pāpe karīne nathī thatu; ane Bhagwānnā bhaktanī mane, vachane, dehe karīne je sevā banī āve ne tene karīne jevu ā jīvnu rūdu thây chhe ne e jīvne sukh thây chhe tevu bīje koī sādhane karīne nathī thatu... Māte jene dehe karīne param sukhiyā thavu hoy ne deh mūkyā kede pan param sukhiya thavu hoy, tene Bhagwānnā bhaktano mane, vachane, dehe karīne droh na karavo.'
